title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps:
1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C) and line baking sheets with parchment paper.
2. In a bowl, cream together the softened butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until smooth.
3. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually blend the dry ingredients into the wet mixture.
6. Stir in chocolate chips by hand.
7. Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto the prepared baking sheets.
8. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are lightly browned.
9. Let stand on baking sheets for 2 minutes before moving to cooling racks.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
2. Fry pancetta with garlic.
3. Beat eggs and mix with cheeses.
4. Drain pasta and combine with pancetta.
5. Remove from heat, add egg-cheese mixture, and stir.
6. Season and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
2. Grill or pan-fry chicken.
3. SautÃ© onion and tomatoes.
4. Add cream and cooked chicken.
5. Simmer and serve with rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps:
1. Chop all vegetables.
2. Heat oil in wok.
3. Add garlic, then vegetables.
4. Stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
5. Add soy sauce and toss.
6. Serve hot.

title: Beef Tacos
steps:
1. Cook beef with taco seasoning.
2. Chop onion, tomato, and lettuce.
3. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.
4. Sprinkle cheese and serve.

title: Greek Salad
steps:
1. Chop vegetables.
2. Mix in a bowl.
3. Add feta and olives.
4. Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle oregano.

title: French Onion Soup
steps:
1. Slice onions and cook in butter until caramelized.
2. Add beef stock and simmer.
3. Toast baguette slices.
4. Serve soup with bread and cheese on top.

title: Pancakes
steps:
1. Mix dry ingredients.
2. Add milk, egg, and melted butter.
3. Whisk until smooth.
4. Cook on a hot griddle until golden.

title: Caesar Salad
steps:
1. Chop lettuce.
2. Grill chicken if using.
3. Toss lettuce with dressing, croutons, and cheese.
4. Top with sliced chicken.

title: Margherita Pizza
steps:
1. Roll out dough.
2. Spread tomato slices and mozzarella.
3. Bake at 220Â°C for 12-15 minutes.
4. Top with basil and drizzle olive oil.

title: Lentil Soup
steps:
1. SautÃ© onion, carrots, and celery.
2. Add lentils and stock.
3. Simmer until lentils are soft.
4. Season with cumin, salt, and pepper.

title: Fish Tacos
steps:
1. Season and cook fish.
2. Shred cabbage.
3. Warm tortillas.
4. Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, sour cream, and cilantro.

title: Egg Fried Rice
steps:
1. Scramble eggs and set aside.
2. SautÃ© vegetables.
3. Add rice and soy sauce.
4. Stir in eggs and green onions.

title: Falafel Wrap
steps:
1. Warm pita breads.
2. Fill with falafel, lettuce, tomato, and cucumber.
3. Drizzle with tahini sauce and wrap.

title: Quiche Lorraine
steps:
1. Pre-bake pie crust.
2. Cook bacon.
3. Whisk eggs and cream.
4. Add bacon and cheese.
5. Pour into crust and bake at 180Â°C for 30-35 minutes.

title: Tom Yum Soup
steps:
1. Boil stock with lemongrass and lime leaves.
2. Add mushrooms and chili.
3. Add shrimp and cook until pink.
4. Season with fish sauce.

title: Avocado Toast
steps:
1. Toast bread.
2. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread on toast and sprinkle chili flakes.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps:
1. Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
2. Cook beef and onion.
3. Mix with rice and tomato sauce.
4. Stuff peppers and top with cheese.
5. Bake at 180Â°C for 25-30 minutes.

title: Banana Bread
steps:
1. Mash bananas.
2. Mix with sugar, butter, and eggs.
3. Add flour, baking soda, and salt.
4. Pour into loaf pan and bake at 175Â°C for 50-60 minutes.

title: Shakshuka
steps:
1. SautÃ© onion and pepper.
2. Add tomatoes and spices.
3. Simmer until thickened.
4. Make wells and crack eggs in.
5. Cover and cook until eggs are set.

title: Mushroom Risotto
steps:
1. SautÃ© onion and mushrooms.
2. Add rice and cook for 1 min.
3. Gradually add stock, stirring.
4. Stir in parmesan and butter at the end.

title: Chicken Karahi
steps:
wash the chicken,
cook the vegetables,
